entry.tran: （城镇）极小的，穷乡僻壤的，闭塞落后的
entry.def: If someone describes a town as a one-horse town, they mean it is very small, dull, and old-fashioned.

example.ex: Would you want to live in a small, one-horse town for your whole life?
example.tran: 你想在一个闭塞落后的小镇上过一辈子吗？

entry.def: If a contest is described as a one-horse race, it is thought that one person or thing will obviously win it.

example.ex: He described the referendum as a one-horse race...
example.tran: 他称这次全民公决是一场胜负分明的比赛。

example.ex: Last season looked to be a one-horse race for much of the time, with the reigning champions coasting to an 11-point lead.
example.tran: 上一赛季大部分时间都毫无悬念，卫冕冠军轻而易举便取得了11分的领先优势。

baesInfo.translate_result: unhorse从…卸下马来，使摔下马来，推翻
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
